content: knitted ribbed beanie/hipster hat in drops sky one-size children s version is 41-21 care for nature 1 drops design pattern no skip-115 yarn group b **size** one-size fits head size approx 54/58 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 07 light sea green **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/41-21-care-for-nature
